metadata.name: BlurBiddies Ponzi #1/1000
metadata.description:
ALL MINT FUNDS GO TOWARDS BLUR BIDS. 

FIRST AND FOREMOST  
THIS IS NOT AN INVESTMENT. NONE OF THIS SHOULD BE CONSTRUED AS FINANCIAL ADVICE OR SHOULD ONE EXPECT ANY RETURN. THERE IS NO UTILITY.

Blurbiddies was created to test how Blur.io Bids affect the human conscience. We will be using EVERY (100%) of mint proceeds towards bidding the floor on Blur. Of course you can sell other places but the place we will be putting all funds is on blur.

We will announce subsequent bid increases with notice so you can adjust your position accordingly.

TL;DR: All mint funds go into blur bids. We will continually increase our bids to increase floor with notice. You can stick around as long as you want. As bids increase, the amount of funds remaining will decrease. 1 ETH is the goal.

Bids will start at mint price (.01) and be raised over time.
